title: NHSRC Notification 2026 - Apply Online for Consultant Posts
description: National Health Systems Resource Centre (NHSRC) has declared the official notification for 2026. To fill up the various vacancies for Consultant Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MBBS, BDS, Post Graduation, MD/ MS, and MPH can grab this chance and apply for the NHSRC Notification 2026 . Here, we included more about the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible aspirantscan apply ...
